title: Handling Categorical Variables:Encoding & Modeling
description: About This KernelHello, kagglers! In this kernel, we are going to fight with categorical variables with some exciting feature encoding techniques and modeling. I hope you enjoy my work and bring me your feedback. If this kernel is useful for you, please don't forget to upvote the kernel and You may ask any question if you have, Let's get started: Vikas Singh, Happy Learning!!
